title: UI Issue while expanding Text Area of Query Schema
description: In Solr UI , Text Area for inputing Parameter "q" in Query Tab is expandable to whole screen which makes the UI disturbed.

comments.author: Satish Sharma
comments.content: Attaching Screen Shot for this issue.

comments.author: Stefan Matheis (steffkes)
comments.content: There is nothing to fix? Your Browser allows you to resize this textarea and if you do so .. well, the Layout might get like this. It doesn't do so, if the only thing you do is put (very) long text in there.
